title: OrganiCity
desc: Organic food and handmade product themed e-commerce site with certification feature. Developed using Vue, Vuetify, Nuxt.js, Node.js and Express.

title: Portfolio Website
desc: A website to present about me. Built using Vue, Vuetify, Nuxt.js.

title: Switter
desc: Socket based social media app with follow and block features. Developed using c# on Windows Forms for windows desktop environment.

title: Song Recommendation System
desc: Used the data from spotify containing 175k+ songs with attributes. Developed using Python, pandas, numpy and used KNN algorithm.

title: PNG to QOI Converter
desc: Implemented a new image format called qoi in C++.

title: Roll The Ball
desc: Casual 2D mobile game. Developed using C# & Unity.

title: Sliding Blocks Game
desc: Simple puzzle game where you aim to create the big picture. Developed using C# in Unity game engine.
